tool_description: The Global IP Information API is your gateway to precise, real-time information about public IP addresses used around the world. Simply input a public IP address, and receive a comprehensive JSON response detailing the IP's region, country, time zone, and more. This API offers a single, user-friendly endpoint, ensuring a seamless integration experience into your application. Stay informed about the global origins of IP addresses with ease.
name: Global IP Information API
title: Global IP Information API

api_list.name: get public ip info
api_list.description:
REST API endpoint to retrieve detailed information of the provided IP address. The IP address has to be a public ip and not an RFC 1918 ip.
**Usage :  /api/v1/publicip?ipaddress=xxx.xxx.xxx.xxx**
